From time immemorial, Agriculture is the backbone of India. It is the domain which desperately needs the intervention of technology for reaching better heights. 

		By this project, we automate the motors in the field by a remote network. The server in the ploughing field receives signals from remote users via Internet and controls the motor accordingly. 

		An additional feature of the project is that it incorporates moisture sensors that reflect the need of irrigation during a particular time. In order to match with the current trend, all these features are to be aggregated into an application in smartphones. 

		With hopes of boosting the depreciating trends in Agriculture, Autogreen will certainly give a whole new meaning to remote control in the near future.
